title: Too-tiny type after monitor upgrade
content:
I recently got a large (30") 4k monitor because I have been having trouble reading text. But Firefox has become practically unusable.

Some sites display with giant text, and I have to press ctrl-minus several times to fit them on the screen.

Meanwhile, the text in the Bookmarks bar, tabs, and URL window are unreadably small.

I tried about:config and layout.css.devPixelsPerPx, which currently seems to have a NEGATIVE value of -1.5. Per directions, I changed it to 1.5. NOTHING. NO CHANGE.

Then I found an endless series of possible fixes, all involving similarly opaque and obscure and user-unfriendly steps.

I might have to abandon Firefox, after all these years, over this. Anybody got a simple fix?

(I now see that I'm actually having the same problem in Windows Explorer, so maybe that's where I need to go to fix this.)

Thanks!
creator: rdworkin

title: Errors on addictinggames.com
content:
I'm using Windows 11 with the latest version of Firefox.

A few days ago I went to addictinggames.com and had no problem playing several games. Today I went there and every game I tried I received the following error "Application error: a client-side exception has occurred (see the browser console for more information)."

Then I went to the site using Microsoft Edge and had no problems, every game I tried worked fine.

In Firefox I disabled both Adblocker Ultimate and Ghostery (My only extensions). Before I went to the site I deleted cookies and Temporary Internet Files and I still got the same error. Any ideas?
creator: stanfromm

title: Animated themes ramp up the ram usage if I minimize firefox.
content:
I have installed an animated theme for my home page a while back, but recently if I minimize firefox the memory usage increases until it freezes my pc completely. I know this issue has been reported as Bug 1828587 2 years ago and it is said that it is fixed, but here I am experiencing the same thing. I would appreciate any help since I am not that good at coding a css file. Here is my userContent.css code if maybe i set something up wrong:

@-moz-document url("about:newtab"), url("about:home"), url(about:privatebrowsing) { 

   /* Sets background image and autoscale image to browser window. */    body {        background-image: url("wallpapers/wallpaper.avif") !important;        background-size: cover !important;        background-repeat: no-repeat !important;        background-attachment: fixed !important;        background-position-x: center !important;        background-position-y: bottom !important;    } 
   @-moz-document url("about:newtab"), url("about:home") {        .top-site-outer .title {            color: white !important;        } 
       .logo-and-wordmark .wordmark {            fill: white !important;            color: #00aaff !important; /* fallback for text */        } 
       .context-menu-button.icon {            fill: white !important; /* for SVG-based icons */            color: white !important; /* for any text-based fallback */            opacity: 1 !important; /* ensure visible even when normally dimmed */        }    }

The second part is to make some of the text on my homepage white so it is visible.

content:

Need somebody to contact me directly and walk through problem via phone call.

Using Firefox version 147.0.1 64-bit

content:

I'm using Firefox 147.0.1 from the official Federa repo.


Thank you for your help.

title: Pediatric Dentist in Dubai: Ensuring Healthy Smiles for Children
content:
Healthy teeth are essential for a child‚Äôs overall growth, speech development, and confidence. A pediatric dentist in Dubai specializes in the oral health of infants, children, and adolescents, providing preventive, diagnostic, and treatment services tailored to young patients. Regular visits help prevent dental issues, educate families on oral hygiene, and ensure children develop strong, healthy teeth for life.

Dubai offers a wide range of pediatric dental services with advanced technology and a child-friendly environment to make dental visits comfortable and stress-free.

What Is a Pediatric Dentist?

A pediatric dentist is a dental professional trained to manage the oral health of children from infancy through adolescence. Unlike general dentists, they focus on:

Early preventive care

Treatment of cavities, gum issues, and misaligned teeth

Guidance on proper oral hygiene habits

Managing dental anxiety in children

Specialized training allows pediatric dentists to handle children‚Äôs unique dental needs and provide a positive experience that encourages lifelong healthy habits.

Why Pediatric Dentistry Is Important

Early dental care lays the foundation for healthy adult teeth. Pediatric dentistry focuses on:

Prevention of Cavities and Tooth Decay: Children are prone to cavities due to diet and oral habits. Regular dental visits help prevent decay.

Healthy Growth and Development: Dentists monitor jaw growth, tooth eruption, and alignment. Early detection of issues like crowded teeth can reduce the need for extensive orthodontic treatment later.

Education for Parents and Children: Pediatric dentists teach proper brushing, flossing, and diet habits for long-term oral health.

Managing Dental Anxiety: Child-focused care reduces fear and builds trust in dental visits, making routine care easier.

By addressing dental health early, parents can avoid complications and support their child‚Äôs overall well-being.

Common Services Offered by Pediatric Dentists

A pediatric dentist in Dubai provides a variety of services, including:

Preventive Care: Regular check-ups, fluoride treatments, sealants, and oral hygiene guidance.

Restorative Care: Fillings, crowns, and treatment of cavities or dental injuries.

Orthodontic Assessments: Early evaluation for braces, Invisalign, or other alignment solutions.

Dental Emergencies: Management of tooth injuries, abscesses, or sudden dental pain.

Behavioral Guidance: Education and techniques to help children accept dental care comfortably.

These services ensure children receive comprehensive care tailored to their age, development, and oral health needs.

Tips for Maintaining Your Child‚Äôs Oral Health

Parents can support pediatric dental care with these practical tips:

Start Early: Begin brushing when the first tooth appears and schedule the first dental visit by age one.

Use Proper Techniques: Teach children gentle brushing twice a day and flossing daily.

Healthy Diet Choices: Limit sugary snacks and drinks to reduce the risk of cavities.

Regular Check-Ups: Schedule visits every 6 months or as advised by the pediatric dentist.

Positive Reinforcement: Encourage good habits with praise, rewards, and fun dental activities.

Consistent home care combined with professional guidance ensures long-term oral health for children.

Why Choose a Pediatric Dentist in Dubai?

Dubai has become a hub for advanced pediatric dental care, offering:

State-of-the-art dental technology for accurate diagnosis and effective treatment

Child-friendly clinics with a welcoming environment to reduce anxiety

Experienced pediatric dentists trained in modern techniques and behavioral management

Comprehensive care from preventive treatments to early orthodontic interventions

These advantages make Dubai an ideal location for families seeking professional and caring pediatric dental services.

When to Schedule Your Child‚Äôs Dental Visit

Parents should schedule visits early to prevent problems and monitor development. Key milestones include:

First dental visit: Around the first birthday or when the first tooth erupts

Routine check-ups: Every 6 months for cleaning, fluoride treatment, and evaluation

Special concerns: If there are signs of cavities, gum issues, tooth misalignment, or dental injuries

Early and regular visits help establish a positive dental experience and allow timely intervention for oral health issues.

Final Thoughts

A pediatric dentist in Dubai plays a vital role in ensuring children maintain healthy teeth and gums from infancy through adolescence. With professional preventive care, restorative treatments, and guidance on oral hygiene, pediatric dentists help children develop healthy dental habits and a lifelong appreciation for oral health.

Choosing a specialized pediatric dentist in Dubai ensures that your child receives expert, gentle, and child-focused care. By prioritizing dental health early, parents can support their children in achieving strong teeth, confident smiles, and overall well-being for years to come.

title: Pediatric Dentist in Dubai: Ensuring Healthy Smiles for Children
content:
Healthy teeth are essential for a child‚Äôs overall growth, speech development, and confidence. A pediatric dentist in Dubai specializes in the oral health of infants, children, and adolescents, providing preventive, diagnostic, and treatment services tailored to young patients. Regular visits help prevent dental issues, educate families on oral hygiene, and ensure children develop strong, healthy teeth for life.

Dubai offers a wide range of pediatric dental services with advanced technology and a child-friendly environment to make dental visits comfortable and stress-free.

What Is a Pediatric Dentist?

A pediatric dentist is a dental professional trained to manage the oral health of children from infancy through adolescence. Unlike general dentists, they focus on:

Early preventive care

Treatment of cavities, gum issues, and misaligned teeth

Guidance on proper oral hygiene habits

Managing dental anxiety in children

Specialized training allows pediatric dentists to handle children‚Äôs unique dental needs and provide a positive experience that encourages lifelong healthy habits.

Why Pediatric Dentistry Is Important

Early dental care lays the foundation for healthy adult teeth. Pediatric dentistry focuses on:

Prevention of Cavities and Tooth Decay: Children are prone to cavities due to diet and oral habits. Regular dental visits help prevent decay.

Healthy Growth and Development: Dentists monitor jaw growth, tooth eruption, and alignment. Early detection of issues like crowded teeth can reduce the need for extensive orthodontic treatment later.

Education for Parents and Children: Pediatric dentists teach proper brushing, flossing, and diet habits for long-term oral health.

Managing Dental Anxiety: Child-focused care reduces fear and builds trust in dental visits, making routine care easier.

By addressing dental health early, parents can avoid complications and support their child‚Äôs overall well-being.

Common Services Offered by Pediatric Dentists

A pediatric dentist in Dubai provides a variety of services, including:

Preventive Care: Regular check-ups, fluoride treatments, sealants, and oral hygiene guidance.

Restorative Care: Fillings, crowns, and treatment of cavities or dental injuries.

Orthodontic Assessments: Early evaluation for braces, Invisalign, or other alignment solutions.

Dental Emergencies: Management of tooth injuries, abscesses, or sudden dental pain.

Behavioral Guidance: Education and techniques to help children accept dental care comfortably.

These services ensure children receive comprehensive care tailored to their age, development, and oral health needs.

Tips for Maintaining Your Child‚Äôs Oral Health

Parents can support pediatric dental care with these practical tips:

Start Early: Begin brushing when the first tooth appears and schedule the first dental visit by age one.

Use Proper Techniques: Teach children gentle brushing twice a day and flossing daily.

Healthy Diet Choices: Limit sugary snacks and drinks to reduce the risk of cavities.

Regular Check-Ups: Schedule visits every 6 months or as advised by the pediatric dentist.

Positive Reinforcement: Encourage good habits with praise, rewards, and fun dental activities.

Consistent home care combined with professional guidance ensures long-term oral health for children.

Why Choose a Pediatric Dentist in Dubai?

Dubai has become a hub for advanced pediatric dental care, offering:

State-of-the-art dental technology for accurate diagnosis and effective treatment

Child-friendly clinics with a welcoming environment to reduce anxiety

Experienced pediatric dentists trained in modern techniques and behavioral management

Comprehensive care from preventive treatments to early orthodontic interventions

These advantages make Dubai an ideal location for families seeking professional and caring pediatric dental services.

When to Schedule Your Child‚Äôs Dental Visit

Parents should schedule visits early to prevent problems and monitor development. Key milestones include:

First dental visit: Around the first birthday or when the first tooth erupts

Routine check-ups: Every 6 months for cleaning, fluoride treatment, and evaluation

Special concerns: If there are signs of cavities, gum issues, tooth misalignment, or dental injuries

Early and regular visits help establish a positive dental experience and allow timely intervention for oral health issues.

Final Thoughts

A pediatric dentist in Dubai plays a vital role in ensuring children maintain healthy teeth and gums from infancy through adolescence. With professional preventive care, restorative treatments, and guidance on oral hygiene, pediatric dentists help children develop healthy dental habits and a lifelong appreciation for oral health.

title: "Reporting community suppression and threats against Firefox advocacy."
content:
"I am a dedicated open-source supporter who has helped 19 new users switch to Zorin OS and Firefox to ensure their privacy. Recently, on the official Zorin OS forum, I was silenced and threatened with a ban by a 'Community Leader' for defending Firefox's Gecko engine.

They accused me of 'advertising' and 'spamming' simply because I shared how many people I‚Äôve converted to Firefox to show the impact of digital freedom. I am reporting this because it‚Äôs discouraging to see major Linux communities treat Firefox supporters as spammers. I hope Mozilla looks into how their advocates are being treated in other OS ecosystems."

title: A list of installed extensions...
content:
Hello everyone. I make backups of folder "bookmarkbackups" in Firefox profile folder, so that when I have to make a restore after a data loss (for whatever reason), I can also restore my bookmarks. I'd like to be able to restore my extensions too, and to do this it would be enough to have a backup of the list of extensions I had installed before the trouble happened. However, if I backup the subfolder "extensions" of the profile folder, I would have a list of files the name of which looks like:

FirefoxColor@mozilla.com.xpi idcac-pub@guus.ninja.xpi uBlock0@raymondhill.net.xpi vpn@proton.ch.xpi {3d92ddc3-5581-453f-ad9f-d9ea864d1f9a}.xpi {531906d3-e22f-4a6c-a102-8057b88a1a63}.xpi

..so that in most cases I cannot guess the extension name from the file name. My purpose is to install manually the extensions in the new browser installation, once I have the list of the extensions. Moreover, in that folder you find all the extensions, both the ones which were active, and the ones which were inactive... But I'd like to have a list of the active ones so that I can re-install only that ones.

Does anyone know how can I get such a list, starting from the profile folder?

Many thanks in advance.

The tabs I had yesterday, 1/22/2026 are the ones I need.
